text: The Santa Margarita River is a river in southern California, between Los Angeles and San Diego. It is about long. It begins in the Santa Ana Mountains and flows west to the Pacific Ocean, at the Gulf of Santa Catalina. ==Nearby rivers== ===North along coast=== *San Juan Creek ===South along coast=== *San Luis Rey River Category:Rivers of California Category:Geography of Riverside County, California Category:San Diego County, California
title: Santa Margarita River
